mapper.select: select * from classroom where enable = true

select count(0) from classroom
and inclass=true
and forstudy=true
and fortest=true

select *,#{date} date from classroom
and inclass=true or fortest=true
and inclass=false and forstudy=true
order by fortest,`name`,`floor`

select *,(select !ap from plan where `date`=date(#{day}) and roomid=classroom.id limit 1) ap from classroom where id in ( select roomid from plan where `date`=date(#{day}) and cid in ( select id from clazz where teacherId=#{teacher.id} ) ) and floor in (select floor from grade_floor where gid=#{clazz.grade.id}) and people >= #{clazz.people}
and inclass=true
and forstudy=true and inclass=false
limit 1

select * from classroom where id not in (select roomid from plan where `date`=#{day} and ap=#{ap}) and floor in (select floor from grade_floor where gid =(select gradeid from clazz where id =#{cid})) and people >= (select people from clazz where id=#{cid})
and inclass=true
and forstudy=true
